[ C ] the layer of a planet's atmosphere above the mesosphere and below the exosphere: It is an important process in the Martian thermosphere. At night the thermosphere of Venus cools far more than that of Mars. the thermosphere
[ S ] the region of the earth's atmosphere that is above the mesosphere and in which the temperature increases with height : Nitric oxide can cool the very hot gas that surrounds the earth known as the thermosphere. Above the troposphere, the atmosphere is divided into the stratosphere, mesosphere, and thermosphere. Compare
